snippet.title: RuPaul's Drag Race Superstar
snippet.description:
Enter the iconic Werk Room and experience the world of RuPaul’s Drag Race. Werk your way to the top by selecting from hundreds of fashion pieces, and create the fiercest look to slay the runway.

Live the life of a Drag Race Superstar by putting your all into the Werk Room against rival Queens trying to snatch your wig.

Once you’ve climbed to the top of the Werk Room, slay your competition with your best looks against other player Queens from around the world to become the Top Queen. Win amazing new fashion pieces to add to your wardrobe, and earn the respect of real Queens from the show! You’ve got what it takes to slay, make sure you don’t sashay away. And may the best drag Queen - Win!

Download now: bit.ly/RDRSuperstarDL
